aboutUs.aboutUsText: Commodities & Logistics Brokers is your reliable partner in the world of freight transport. We're trusted because we offer time-tested solutions and a professional approach to each client.

ourStory.heading: Our Story
ourStory.bigCard: Our mission is not just about connecting producers with end buyers but to make this process as efficient and comfortable for both parties as possible.
ourStory.smallCard: We are CL Broker, your indispensable assistant in the agricultural trade, specializing in grains and oilseeds. Our mission is not just about connecting producers with end buyers but to make this process as efficient and comfortable for both parties as possible. For over eight years, we have been deeply involved in consultancy, helping even novice farmers understand the intricacies of international exports.

cards.card1: A vast global network of brokers, allowing us to find the optimal conditions for a deal
cards.card2: In-depth knowledge in logistics: be it rail transport, road transport, or sea shipment - we have the best solutions for you
cards.card3: Strong partnerships with numerous international companies, keeping us updated with the latest market trends
cards.card4: A vast global network of brokers, allowing us to find the optimal conditions for a deal
cards.card5: In-depth knowledge in logistics: be it rail transport, road transport, or sea shipment - we have the best solutions for you
cards.card6: Strong partnerships with numerous international companies, keeping us updated with the latest market trends

careers.careersSubtitle: Paving the Way to Innovation and New Horizons
careers.cardsBigText: We are rapidly expanding and in search of new talents to broaden our team and spread our mission further.
careers.cardsSmallText: While we frequently post specific job listings, if you believe you have a unique skil set and are poised to make a contribution, we eagerly await your application. We are on the lookout for brokers with exemplary experience in trading, particularly within the realms of cereals, oilseeds, and mineral fertilizers. Our execution managers possess an in-depth understanding of international economic contracts. We seek candidates with fluent English proficiency, as well as knowledge of other foreign languages. Join us and become a part of the Commodities Logistics  Brokers team — leaders in our field!

commodityBrokerage.commodityBrokerageSubtitle: Your link between buyer and seller
commodityBrokerage.heroText: In the world of agricultural trade, every detail matters. Commodities Logistics Brokers, as your commodity broker, does more than just connect buyers and sellers. We act as your strategic partner, offering in-depth market analysis and providing optimal conditions for both parties.

services.text1: Our team of professionals studies current trends to provide you with the most relevant information and recommendations
services.text2: We consider the needs and expectations of both parties to establish the best collaboration conditions
services.text3: At every step, we stand by your side, offering advice and active participation in negotiations to achieve the best deal terms
services.text4: We propose diverse options of potential partners from various regions, based on your business strategy
services.text5: Our goal is to provide you with the best prices and terms, ensuring your collaboration is not only profitable but also stable

execution.executionSubtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.
execution.heroBigText: With professional insights into GAFTA and FOSFA regulations, our experts regularly undergo training to stay abreast of the latest recommendations and shifts in the global trade landscape.
execution.heroSmallText: Experienced in various contract terms like EXW, FCA, CPT, DAP, FOB, CNF, and CIF, we ensure seamless execution and adherence to all stipulations at every stage of the contractual process. Recognizing the pivotal role of legal expertise in contract management, we have an outsourced team of seasoned attorneys ready to assist when needed. This legal squad, armed with a deep understanding of international trade laws, guarantees the protection of our clients' rights and obligations fulfillment.

exportConsulting.exportConsultingSubtitle: Simplifying Export Procedures from Producers to Buyers
exportConsulting.heroBigText: We specialize in providing comprehensive consulting services tailored to meet the specific needs of farmers, growers, and agribusinesses. Our experienced specialists are focused on finding the best solution for Customer goods
exportConsulting.heroSmallText: At Commodity & Logistics Brokers  we understand that the agricultural industry is not just about growing crops; it's also about successfully navigating the complex world of international trade. Exporting agricultural products can be a challenging endeavor, but with our expertise and guidance, we make it easier for producers to reach global markets and connect with buyers worldwide.

services.text1: We conduct in-depth market research to identify high-demand international markets for your agricultural products
services.text1_1: Assess market trends and consumer preferences to help you tailor your products accordingly
services.text2: Navigate the complex of international trade regulations, import restrictions, and quality standards
services.text2_1: Ensure that your products meet all the necessary requirements for export
services.text3: Optimize your supply chain to minimize costs and maximize efficiency
services.text3_1: Recommend logistics solutions to ensure safe and timely delivery of your products to buyers on different delivery basis
services.text4: Assist in the preparation of all necessary export documents, including customs declarations, quality, phytosanitary and origin certificates, etc
services.text4_1: Ensure compliance with all international trade documentation requirements
services.text5: Identify and connect you with potential buyers in target markets
services.text5_1: Provide guidance on negotiation, contracts, and payment terms to secure profitable deals
services.text6: Implement quality control measures to maintain the quality and freshness of your products during transportation
services.text6_1: Minimize product losses and ensure customer satisfaction

whyChoose.text1: Our team of experienced agricultural consultants has a deep understanding of the industry and global trade dynamics.
whyChoose.text2: We offer personalized solutions that address your unique challenges and goals.
whyChoose.text3: Our commitment to transparency and integrity ensures that you have a trustworthy partner in the trading and delivery process.
